name: Stories UI Kit
description:
Add Stories to your designs in seconds!


The design team at Storyteller created this UI Kit to make it as easy as possible to add Stories to your designs. It includes responsive components, customisable styles and more.... but that's not even the best part!


The best part is that Storyteller makes it easy for developers to add Stories to any app, with the customisation options set out in this Figma file and in our developer documentation.


Storyteller has native SDKs for iOS, Android, React Native and the web!
